main event: Three round objects were observed in the sky near Heidelberg, Pennsylvania for about 10 seconds.
interesting points: The objects were described as round, half of a ball of fire, bright and not fire-orange in color.
The objects were observed at high altitude, moved silently, and disappeared.
Another person called the witness's attention to the objects.
The objects were observed moving in a southeast direction at cloud level or higher, and then disappeared in the northeast direction at a slow speed.
The sighting lasted approximately 45 seconds and the objects disappeared immediately upon entering a cloud.
